name: Stream Plays Puzzle
description:
Play a "falling blocks puzzle game" via Twitch chat!

Your chat uses can vote which command will be used, then after a few seconds the most voted command is applied. In case of a tie, it will wait until the tie is broken.

Note: the user/token are for a Twitch user that will read the chat for commands; it doesn't have to be the channel owner.

This was made for the 1JAM-Co-Op gamejam.
